child.pub-comments: mzk is the code for Nigeria Mambila while mcu is that for Cameroun Mambila

child.pub-comments: According to the authors, "Because of …the still poor documentation of Plateau, it is again possible that Plateau is not a single valid subgroup but a cluster of co-ordinate groupings" (p.260).

child.pub-comments: The place of Adjukru is uncertain since the authors have it thus :"Adjukru, though it has been classed as West Atlantic by some, is clearly a part of the Nyo group, but probably deserves the status of a co-ordinate branch. We consider this a prime area for further investigation".

child.pub-comments: The place of Avikam is uncertain since the authors have it thus :"Avikam is clearly West SCNC, probably closely affiliated with, if not part of, Volta-Comoe.
